services.title: Services We Offer
services.subtitle: From simple landing pages to complex full-stack applications, we deliver quality code with premium design.

pillars.title: Clean Code
pillars.desc: Well-structured, maintainable, and documented code following industry best practices.

pillars.title: UI/UX Focus
pillars.desc: Every pixel matters. We design interfaces that are beautiful, intuitive, and conversion-optimized.

pillars.title: Modern Tech
pillars.desc: Built with the latest technologies: Next.js, React, TypeScript, and modern animation libraries.

howitworks.title: How We Bring Your Ideas to Life

steps.title: Define
steps.desc: We discuss your goals, target audience, and project requirements in detail.

steps.title: Design
steps.desc: Creating wireframes and UI mockups that align with your brand identity.

steps.title: Build
steps.desc: Development with clean code architecture, responsive design, and smooth animations.

steps.title: Test
steps.desc: Thorough testing across devices and browsers to ensure everything works perfectly.

steps.title: Launch
steps.desc: Deployment to production with domain setup, analytics, and performance optimization.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing, No Hidden Fees
pricing.subtitle: Choose a package that fits your needs. All packages include deployment and basic support.

items.a: We primarily use Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for frontend. For backend, we use Node.js, Express, NestJS, or Laravel depending on project needs. Database options include PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Supabase.

items.q: How long does it take to complete a project?
items.a: Timeline depends on project complexity. A landing page typically takes 3-5 days, while a fullstack dashboard can take 10-14 days. We provide accurate estimates after initial consultation.
Yes! Each package includes a specific number of revisions. The Professional plan includes 3 revisions, Business includes 5, and Enterprise offers unlimited revisions.
We require 50% upfront (DP) to start the project. The remaining 50% is due upon project completion and your approval, before deployment.

items.q: Can you help with hosting and domain?
items.a: Absolutely! We guide you through domain purchase and hosting setup. Most of our projects are deployed on Vercel or Netlify for optimal performance.
Yes, you receive the complete source code upon project completion and final payment. The code is well-documented and structured for easy maintenance.

items.q: Can I request changes after the project is done?
items.a: Yes! We offer maintenance and update services at hourly or per-task rates. We also provide training on how to manage content if your project includes a CMS.

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Amazing?
cta.subtitle: Let's turn your ideas into a stunning digital reality. Start a conversation today.

footer.tagline: Professional coding service by Gadang Jatu Mahiswara. Clean code, modern design, delivered on time.

about.title: Gadang Jatu Mahiswara
about.bio: Informatics Engineering undergraduate at Universitas Negeri Surabaya with a strong foundation in web application development and UI/UX design. Skilled in learning and implementing end-to-end full-stack solutions, from building responsive and accessible user interfaces to developing back-end services with RESTful APIs and database integration.

values.title: Clean Code
values.desc: Well-structured, readable, and maintainable code is non-negotiable.

values.title: On Time
values.desc: Deadlines are commitments. Every project is delivered as promised.

values.title: Transparent
values.desc: Open communication about progress, challenges, and solutions.

values.title: Confidential
values.desc: Your project details and source code are treated with utmost confidentiality.
